meanings.definition: To focus one's attention or thoughts on something
meanings.sent1: She was fixating on her favorite book, unable to look away.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys fixating on solving puzzles in his free time.
meanings.sent3: The cat was fixating on a laser pointer, thinking it was a bug.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was fixating on the idea of traveling to distant lands.
meanings.sent5: The child was fixating on the colorful balloons, mesmerized by their beauty.

meanings.definition: To become obsessively preoccupied with something
meanings.sent1: He started fixating on his upcoming exam, worrying excessively.
meanings.sent2: She tends to fixate on small details, sometimes missing the bigger picture.
meanings.sent3: The dog was fixating on a squirrel, determined to catch it.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were fixating on the negative feedback he received.
meanings.sent5: The student was fixating on getting a perfect score, pushing himself to study harder.
